trans-unit.source: Exposes a generic <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> of designer glyphs associated with an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 公開與活動設計工具相關聯的設計工具圖像 (Glyph) 之泛型 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection> contains all designer glyphs that appear on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class with which the collection is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection> 會包含與集合關聯之 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 類別上出現的所有設計工具圖像。

trans-unit.source: You can access the contents of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection> through the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以經由 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection> 屬性存取 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> class that is empty and has the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體為空白且具有預設的初始容量。
包含 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 物件的可列舉泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified generic collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" />, and has sufficient capacity to accommodate the number of elements copied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，其包含複製自 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" />的指定泛型集合之項目，且具有足以容納複製之項目的容量。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> from which to copy collection elements.
trans-unit.target: 要從中複製集合項目的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> and has sufficient capacity to accommodate the number of elements copied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體包含從指定之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> 複製的項目，且具有足以容納複製之項目的容量。
